phrases: Hey, is not he super hot?
How often do you see someone that hot?
Maybe I will try talking to him.
You are just going to get burned.
Hey, that guy looks super strong.
He is so my role model.
How often do you run into someone that built?
Maybe I will try sparring with him.
You are just going to get burned.
We were on the same train.
I did not realize you were on it.
I could totally see you, though.
I am Gouda Takeo, a first-year in high school.
This guy's my friend, Sunakawa Makoto.
I have known him since we were three.
It is spring in Japan, but I am experiencing spring, too.
After all, for the first time in my life, I have a girlfriend!
You should watch where you are going.
He is just helping you get to the top.
It is not like I did anything.
This year's spring is the true spring!
I decided to try making Japanese sweets for the first time.
I thought these cherry blossom petal shapes and stuff were cute.
You are great at making Japanese sweets, too.
It makes me so happy when you say that, Takeo-kun!
Earlier, I was thinking the same thing, too.
It would not surprise me if you two keep having this conversation, even when you are old and wrinkly.
Then can I go home now?
It would be great if we could stay like this forever.
Can I take a selfie with you?
Can I use it for my lock screen, too?
I am going to take it.
I feel like my heart's about to explode...
Send that to my cell, too.
I want to use it for my wallpaper.
But why is she so happy that I am her boyfriend?
YOU-Um, my friend wants to do a singles' meet.
I have five friends who do not have boyfriends,
and they want to meet you and your friends.
I just have to get my friends together, right?
Was that your boyfriend just now?
He has a nice deep voice.
When it comes to guy friends, I have more than most.
That makes me super happy, man!
Those among you who do not have a girlfriend,
Those among you who want to do a singles' meet, raise your hand.
You are coming, whether you like it or not.
Sure, but I probably will not talk at all.
There may be a nice girl there.
They must all be great girls.
Just because someone is friends with a nice person
does not mean they are nice, too.
Sometimes, they are friends because the person's nice enough to have them.
What you said just now was really complicated.
Takeo-kun, they are the friends who will be coming to the singles' meet tomorrow.
I am feeling really shy about introducing you to them!
She is always herself, no matter where she is.
The other girls here are all friends from my class.
This girl talks about her boyfriend every day.
Yes, that is what people call what you do.
Oh, you are just as tall as Rinko said...
I almost mistook you for a bear.
J-Just like Rinko said, you have big hands.
I almost mistook you for a bear.
You were lighter than I expected.
It is dangerous to leave boxes here.
Maybe I will move them out of the way, so people can pass through.
Maybe we should tell the restaurant staff?
That sort of thing should be reported to the management company, not the restaurant staff.
Uh, is that one of the bear's friends?
The more you look at him, the hotter he is.
But he is not talking at all.
Want to try talking to him?
I actually thought he had to be Rinko's boyfriend.
You did a lot of work.
Oh, it is no big deal.
I wonder why she went for the bear.
I am happy for you, Takeo.
I am really glad for you, man.
And why does everyone like her boyfriend so much?
We should toss you in the air again tomorrow.
Let us aim for three tosses next time.
All right, let us start with a toast.
Oh, we do not have a bottle opener.
Wow, you opened it with your bare hands!
Takeo, that is not how you are supposed to open them.
Hey, so you all attend an all-girls' high school, right?
So you do not have any guys?
Do not ask Yamato's friends stupid questions!
You would better not do them any wrong!
So none of you girls has a boyfriend?
We do not have any opportunities to meet them.
Well, we are co-ed, but we do not have any opportunities, either.
All the girls go for the popular guys.
If there are any, there is only our school festival.
Can we go to that, too?
Our last festival in junior high, we ran a cafe.
Hey, can I come sit with you guys?
Did you run a cafe, too?
I made a lot of pound cake in different flavors.
Oh, I would have liked to have tried them.
I will bake some for tomorrow!
I would not be surprised if you ate a whole cake in one go.
Oh, oops, my contact lens shifted.
Sorry, I will go fix it in the restroom.
Nanako and Ayu still have not come back.
I will go take a look.
He is way too tall, you know?
I cannot believe he is the boyfriend.
Rinko kept going on about how cool he was,
so I thought he must be this hottie, you know?
Yeah, I almost had a heart attack!
I would not have the guts to be seen with him.
Just because someone is friends with a nice person
does not mean they are nice, too.
And she says he is cool.
I wonder if Rinko's right in the head.
My friends said mean things about you, Takeo-kun.
I am sure they hurt your feelings.
There are all kinds of people.
You do not need to worry about me.
You are the one who got hurt.
It is because there are all kinds of people
that I was able to meet you, Yamato.
I do not like seeing you cry.
I found out that you have been saying really nice things about me to your friends.
I really like you a lot, Takeo-kun...
I bet I just did not explain very well.
I must have been so vague,
they did not get how cool you are.
When I go back, I will try to explain it in a way that is easier to understand.
I do not need you to do that for me.
They just do not know the real you, Takeo-kun.
Every day, I am thankful that I met you.
I hope things can stay this way forever.
I called the fire department when a fire suddenly broke out,
but they are not here yet.
I cannot find Nanako and Ayu!
They have not come back from the bathroom.
I will bring them out, I promise!
You looked really happy in the photo you sent my phone.
He helped me and got left behind.
I guess this is really it...
I guess I have been too happy lately.
Yamato, it is all thanks to you.
If I can die helping you,
it is not such a bad way to go.
I guess it still has a signal.
So, Yamato-san's this close to jumping into the flames.
Now that you have grasped the situation,
can you get back here AS SOON AS POSSIBLE?
Life's pretty boring for me, too, if you are not around.
You do not need to worry about me.
I hate it when you cry, more than anything.
I swear that I will never make you cry again.
Is this the suspension bridge effect?
He is not my type at all!
Hey, so I think I was not clear enough
So I am going to try to explain in a way that is easier to understand
D-Do not steal him from me!
I mean, there is no way we could.
He only has eyes for you.
I have a feeling the only way you would die is from old age.
Feeling major respect all over again!
Takeo-kun, thank you so much for today.
Everyone understands why you are a good person now.
You were super cool today, too!
If you became a firefighter or something,
I think you would do a lot of good work,
even though I would get worried...
